input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Balsam Hill Green BH Norway Spruce Holiday Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Red/Green Outdoor Winter Evergreen Wreath'
  - Name='Village Lighting Company 9' Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Haute Decor 6 Foot Poinsettia Pre-lit Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Pre-Lit B/O Tree, Star, and Pinecone Christmas Garland'
  - Name='LED Cascading Light Clusters'
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9 ft.'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6' Christmas Pine Artificial Garland with 50 Warm White LED Lights and Berries'
  - Name='Kurt Adler 9' Virginia Pine Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 8" Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Andover Mills 72" Pine Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Pre-Lit Artificial Pine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Ashland 5ft. Foliage Mix Coiled Garland'
  - Name='Ashland 6ft. Green Boxwood Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree 251262 9 ft. 50-Clear Lights Golden Bristle Lighted Branch Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Green BH Norway Spruce Holiday Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar artificial holiday garland intended for similar decoration uses, but made of Norway Spruce rather than Carolina or Norwood Fir and no light info; high relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Red/Green Outdoor Winter Evergreen Wreath
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A wreath rather than a garland, so different shape and use despite both being evergreen decorations; lower relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Village Lighting Company 9' Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial garland of similar length and use, although brand and specific branch type differ; fairly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor 6 Foot Poinsettia Pre-lit Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland but shorter length and inclusion of poinsettia flowers sets it apart, making it less similar to plain pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pre-Lit B/O Tree, Star, and Pinecone Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland featuring pinecones similar to reference, but inclusion of tree and star decorations suggests additional differences; moderate relevance.
Not a garland but a lighting cluster product; no structural similarity or garland function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9 ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Essentially the exact same product name and length as reference; very likely identical or highly similar pre-lit Norwood Fir garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6' Christmas Pine Artificial Garland with 50 Warm White LED Lights and Berries
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine garland with pre-lit LED lights similar in style, but shorter length and presence of berries differentiates it somewhat.
Same length pine garland from a different brand with a different pine type; no mention of pre-lit features but similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 8" Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit 9-foot artificial pine garland from another brand; similar decorative use and lighting but different pine species.
Pine garland but shorter length (6 feet) and no mention of pre-lit lights; still relevant as similar evergreen decoration.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pre-Lit Artificial Pine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial pine garland similar in intended use, but no length or branch type specified, so slightly less precise.
Shorter length and mixed foliage rather than just pine; also a coil shape which differs from traditional garland style.
Different plant type altogether; boxwood garland which serves a similar decorative purpose but visually and materially distinct.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand pre-lit artificial garland but no specifics about length or branch type; relevant though less specific than reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree 251262 9 ft. 50-Clear Lights Golden Bristle Lighted Branch Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, 9-foot lighted garland but fewer lights and different light color; similar product category and function.
